title: Degradation of organic pollutants using a ternary heterojunction catalyst (CoS2/CoCo2O4â€“MnFe2O4) for activating peroxymonosulfate with magnetic separation, anti-ion interference, and low ion leaching
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00475B, Paper
Ying Shen, Fan Qiu, Yang Fan, Yaming Wang, Jiawei Kang, Mengdie Yang, Junjie Chen, Haiou Song, Shupeng Zhang
Activating persulfate to generate reactive oxygen species (ROS) for the effective degradation of toxic organic compounds is an important research topic in environmental management.
